snippet.title: Backyard Baseball '97 Trailer - Coming Soon to Steam!
snippet.description:
It's time to dust off your cleats and grab your favorite bat! The legendary Backyard Baseball '97 is swinging back onto the scene on October 10th (the anniversary of the original game!). We're honored to partner with Playground Productions to bring this childhood classic back to life.

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997, now updated for modern systems. Build your roster from among the iconic Backyard Kids, aim for those home runs, and various game modes. Relive the magic of this classic baseball game!

Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/MCSBYB97WYT 
More about Backyard Baseball '97 here: https://bit.ly/MCSBYB97 ⚾
Visit our website: https://megacatstudios.com/

CHECK US ON SOCIAL MEDIA
Facebook: http://bit.ly/MCSFB
Instagram: http://bit.ly/MCS-IG
Twitter/X: http://bit.ly/MCS-X
LinkedIn: https://bit.ly/MCS-LIn

BACKYARD SPORTS SOCIAL MEDIA
Instagram: @backyardsportsofficial
TikTok: @backyardsports 
YouTube: @backyardsports 
X: @_backyardsports

PLAYGROUND PRODUCTIONS SOCIAL MEDIA
Instagram: @playground.productions
